events.title: Winterfest 2025
events.recap:
Thank you everyone who came by our stand at Winterfest and supported SIMP! It was great to see so many new faces and people interested in our club - in fact, we have gained over 100+ member just from this one event!

We hope to see you all at future events! May our love and passion for hoyoverse games bring us together and serve as a platform for building new friendships~

Ad Astra Academique!

events.desc:
SIMP is hosting our first social event! We are inviting all of you to come attend our welcome party, for an evening of games, trivia and lots more! Meet our committee and others in our community, compete in teams for prizes, and start your uni semester with a blast!

Date: Friday 1st August
Time: 5:00pm to 7:00pm
Location: Room 102, Alan Gilbert Building
events.title: Welcome Party 25S2
events.recap: Thank you to everyone who came to our welcome party! It was amazing meeting so many of you - there was around 100 of us that day, getting to know each other and playing fun games together! We hope to see all of you at our future events!

events.desc:
The first ever Unimelb Holy Grail War is approaching! Whether you seek the Holy Grail, or simply want to lay back and have fun, come along with your friends to enjoy a great night!
Not only will we be hosting the Competition, we will have the classic Genshin TCG, Guess Who and more games for you to discover on the day!
events.title: Unimelb Holy Grail War
events.recap:
SIMP HSR HOLY GRAIL WAR COMPETITION HIGHIGHTS!

Thank you everyone for attending our event! It was great to see everyone bringing their devices and battling it out in the new Holy Grail Game mode! It was also nice to have another community members having some fun with our NEWLY purchased mihoyo board games including â€œLiyue millennial board gameâ€ and the offical Genshin TCG cards!

Congrats to Jason for winning our Holy Grail, Jimmy and Leli for placing 2nd place and 3rd place respectively.

What did you think of the event? Let us know down in the comments~!

Hope you see all of you next time!

The Student Institution of Mihoyo Players is an UMSU-affiliated club at the University of Melbourne.

events.desc:
Hoyo Kitchen! ğŸ¥˜

Come down to SIMPâ€™s Hoyo Kitchen for a tasty treat and enjoy some hoyo-inspired dishes!

For this event, you have the opportunity to be the chef behind the counter and bring hoyo-dishes to life!

We will provide for you:
- 3 recipes of Genshin & HSR cuisines + ingredients
- Ingredients if you want to make your own cuisine (please tell us what you need in google form, we will buy them for you!)
- Pizza & drinks during dinner time

What we need from you:
- $5 entry fee, paid on UMSU website
- DoFoodSafely Certificate (link in sign-up form)
- We would also like everyone to sign up early, so that we can better prepare for the event!

Time: 3-8pm
Date: 10th Oct (Friday)
Location: Student Kitchen (Student Pavillion level 4)
